mapper.insert: insert into erp_purchase (purchase_id, purchase_items_id, purchase_qnt, purchase_employee, purchase_location, purchase_date, purchase_warehouse, purchase_price) values(#{purchase_id}, #{purchase_items_id}, #{purchase_qnt}, #{purchase_employee}, #{purchase_location}, #{purchase_date}, #{purchase_warehouse}, #{purchase_price} )
mapper.update: update erp_purchase set purchase_date=#{purchase_date}, purchase_warehouse=#{purchase_warehouse}, purchase_price=#{purchase_price}, purchase_qnt=#{purchase_qnt}, purchase_employee=#{purchase_employee}, purchase_location=#{purchase_location} where purchase_id = #{purchase_id}
